text:
Vincent R. Impellitteri
Mayor
3 t>8
WNYC
WNYC-FM
THE CITY OF NEW YORK
MUNICIPAL BROADCASTING SYSTEM
MUNICIPAL BUILDING
NEW YORK 7, N. Y.
WHitehall 3-3600
July 6,
Mr. Harry J. Skornia
Executive Director
NAEB
119 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Harry:
I have your note of July 2 concerning Burton Paulu's
correspondence and Station Sixty.
I look forward to receiving all of the material. I will
do the best I can to put together some decent entries.
I have received a very excellent letter from Lew Hill
out at the Pacifica Foundation and it seems to me that
we may after all come out with a very decent sort of
prize winning entry.
Seymour N. Siegel
Director
1953
